name: postman-api-automation-demo
description: Senior-level API automation demo with positive/negative tests, SLA and schema validation

scripts.test:positive: newman run postman/collection.json -e postman/environments/local.json -d data/positive-cities.json -r html --reporter-html-export reports/report-positive.html
scripts.test:negative: newman run postman/collection.json -e postman/environments/local.json -d data/negative-cities.json -r html --reporter-html-export reports/report-negative.html
scripts.test: npm run test:positive && npm run test:negative
